## decode2HalfFromRGBA() function

Decodes two half floats that was encoded into a rgba8unorm

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function decode2HalfFromRGBA(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope, value: PBShaderExp): PBShaderExp;
```

</td></tr>

**Returns:**

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)
